dialogue.text: You there! Move out of the way!
It's been a while, old man.
Am I supposed to know you?
I repeat, move out of the way or there will be consequences.
5 years ago you took everything from me.
What did you do to Elly, old man?
I have had enough of this, kill him!
Oak village massacre, do you remember it?
Oh! Hahaha. So you are a survivor of the village then? And so you have come for revenge.
I will make sure you pay for what you have done.
